title: Night Falls
description: I was dead. No, I was dying. My last memory were the blinding headlights of a lorry.I told myself, if only I'd listened, if only I'd stayed. But it was too late. The night had won. The fight was over.Thatâ€™s not the beginning. Far from it, my story began in a small town up North, in Lancashire, a tiny place called South Hill. A place where I was just a seventeen-year-old and the words vampire, werewolf, and witch were creations of fiction.
author: Joseph Eastwood
